Catch a Frog in a Bucket
advancements.husbandry.squid_in_a_bucket: Catch a Squid or a Glow Squid in a Bucket
advancements.husbandry.duplicate_allay.d: Duplicate an Allay while it is dancing near a Jukebox using an Amethyst Shard
advancements.husbandry.play_jukebox.desc: Play a Music Disc in a Jukebox
advancements.husbandry.rare_axolotl_in_a: Catch the rarest Axolotl variant in a Bucket
advancements.husbandry.brush_mob.title: You Can Pet the Dog!
advancements.husbandry.brush_mob.descrip: Pet a passive mob with a Brush
advancements.husbandry.cure_poison_with_: Cure poison by drinking a Honey Bottle
advancements.nether.tip_arrows_in_potion: Tip Arrows in a Potion Cauldron
advancements.nether.poison_potato_in_pot: Poison a Potato in a Potion Cauldron
text.autoconfig.odyssey.title: Odyssey - Options
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.items.@To: Changes to the way certain items function
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.items.ite: Stack Size Changes
Configure the stack size of various items
Sign Stack Size
Changes the stack size of Signs and Hanging Signs
Boat Stack Size
Changes the stack size of Boats and Chest Boats
Minecart Stack Size
Changes the stack size of Minecarts
Banner Stack Size
Changes the stack size of Banners
Banner Pattern Stack Size
Changes the stack size of Banner Patterns
Armor Stand Stack Size
Changes the stack size of Armor Stands
Decorated Pot Stack Size
Changes the stack size of Decorated Pots
Snowball Stack Size
Changes the stack size of Snowballs
Egg Stack Size
Changes the stack size of Eggs
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.items.mor: Shears can be repaired with Iron Ingots, Brushes with Feathers, and Tridents with Prismarine Shards
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.items.sil: Silk Touch and Fortune on Shears
Shears can now be enchanted with Silk Touch and Fortune
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.items.all: Allows for Potions of Mining Fatigue to be brewed using Elder Guardian Thorns
Allows for Potions of Haste to be brewed by inverting a Potion of Mining Fatigue with a Fermented Spider Eye
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.@T: Changes to the way certain blocks function
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.an: Damaged Anvils can be repaired by right-clicking on them with a Block of Iron
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.fe: Falling onto Farmland with Feather Falling will not trample it
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.li: Lily Pads can be right-clicked with Bone Meal to grow more of them nearby
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.sp: Spore Blossoms can be right-clicked with Bone Meal to duplicate them
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.sm: Using Bone Meal on a Small Dripleaf will drop 2 of itself when it growing into a Big Dripleaf, making it truly renewable
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.re: Cobblestone generators below Y=0 will create Cobbled Deepslate instead of Cobblestone
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.ha: Budding Amethyst is no longer mined faster by Pickaxes in order to prevent players from accidentally breaking it
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.sn: Sniffer Eggs placed on Magma Blocks will not hatch, which is useful for using them as decoration!
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.un: Blocks of Gunpowder will instantly explode when they catch on fire or when lit with Flint and Steel or Fire Charges
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.fl: Small Flowers can be right-clicked with an empty hand to instantly drop themselves as an item instead of having to destroy them in order to obtain them
text.autoconfig.odyssey.option.blocks.pi: Pistons can be right-clicked with a Slimeball to turn them into Sticky Pistons, and Sticky Pistons can be right-clicked with an Axe to turn them into normal Pistons
Changes to the way certain entities function
Saddle Removing
Pigs and Striders can have their saddles removed when right-clicked on while crouching
Decreased Rabbit Fall Damage
Rabbits will only take fall damage after falling 10 or more blocks
Renewable Elder Guardians
Guardians that are struck by lightning will turn into Elder Guardians
Armor Stand Arms
Armor Stands can be right-clicked on with a Stick to give them arms
Vexes Die Alongside Evokers
When an Evoker is killed, any Vexes that it had summoned will also die alongside it
Slime and Magma Cube Converting
Slimes on Magma Blocks will turn into Magma Cubes after a short period of time, and Magma Cubes in water will turn into Slimes
Bucketable Frogs
Frogs can be picked up in empty buckets
Bucketable Squids and Glow Squids
Squids and Glow Squids can be picked up in water buckets
Hidden Fire Overlay with Fire Resistance
The fire overlay won't render on mobs or players with Fire Resistance
Item Frame Waxing
Filled Item Frames and Glow Item Frames can be waxed with Honeycomb to prevent items inside of them from being rotated
Item Frame Shearing
Filled Item Frames and Glow Item Frames can be sheared to make the frame part invisible
Improved Mount HUD
When riding on an entity, the player's hunger bar will now properly display on the in-game HUD
